name: the-monkees-website
description: This website offers both existing and potential fans of a band or musician  (The Monkees in this case) a way to see and hear songs from the bands back catalog and find out about any new material as it becomes available. The site provides information and links to buy tickets for the bands upcoming concerts as well as a method of booking the band for private events. Fans can learn about the individual members of The Monkees through the band section and provides links to the bands social media and a newsletter sign-up option.

name: memory-game
description: SIMON is a game that creates sequences of sounds and lights and requires a player to repeat the sequence. If the player succeeds, the sequence becomes progressively longer and more complex until the game ends at level 10. The game consists of two modes normal and strict, on strict mode if the player makes a mistake they must restart from level 1.

name: guessing-game
description: Riddle-Me-This is a web application game that asks players to guess the answer to a riddle. The player is presented with text that contains the riddle. Players enter their answer into a textarea and submit their answer using a form. If a player guesses correctly, they are redirected to the next riddle. If a player guesses incorrectly, their incorrect guess is stored and printed below the riddle. Multiple players can play an instance of the game at the same time. Users are identified by a unique username. At the end of each game a leaderboard is displayed that ranks top scores for all users.

name: digital-cookbook
description: Digital Cookbook is a responsive web application that allows users to create, give feedback on, update, delete and read cooking recipes.

name: issue-tracker
description: This application is an issue tracker/new feature request platform for a theoretical app. The 'Great Idea Issue Tracker' is a responsive web application that allows users to create, upvote, pay for, comment on, update, view progress on, delete and read tickets containing bugs or new feature suggestions. The app was developed as a platform from which an existing platform can be improved and a team can receive constructive criticism and suggestions from their customers.

name: javascript-piano
description: The JavaScript Piano is a simple, responsive web application that allows users to play the chords in the C Major musical scale using either their keyboard or by click the buttons on screen.

name: javascript-clock
